page.title: 20LOWESTOFT IN THE PAST
page.content:
We asked an elderly gentlemen about old Lowestoft. He is most familiar with the North side of the bridge. He remembers the old swing bridge built in 1897. It used to be the fastest acting bridge in England. There were many cinemas & entertainment halls; Earlier, the Grand Cinema was the site of Lowestoft Swimming Pool. Other cinemas were The Kinema & Cosy Corner. The interviewee has lived in Lowestoft for 78yrs, 6mths, & 22 days. He left school at the age of 14 & he repaired the herring nets for the Lowestoft Fishing Industry.
This information was compiled by pupils, teachers & parents from the following schools: Kirkley Middle, Pakefield Middle, Fen Park Primary & Whitton Green Primary, with help from members of the local community
